data.text:
About Gary Barber

Gary Barber serves as Chief Executive Officer of Spyglass Entertainment. Gary Barber has been Chairman and Chief Executive Officer at Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Inc. Gary Barber co-founded Spyglass Entertainment Group, LLC in 1998 and serves as its Co-Chairman. Gary Barber has been directly responsible for operating companies in feature film production and distribution, foreign theatrical, video and TV distribution, exhibition and pre-recorded music and music publishing. He served as Chief Executive Officer of Spyglass Entertainment Group, LLC. Gary Barber founded the production, finance and distribution company Spyglass Entertainment with his business partner, Roger Birnbaum, Gary Barber served as Co-Chairman and Co-Chief Executive Officer of Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Inc. He serves as Chairman of the Board at MGM Holdings Inc. Gary Barber served as Vice Chairman and Chief Operating Officer of Morgan Creek Productions. Gary Barber served as President of Vestron International Group. Gary Barber spent seven years at Price Waterhouse as a member of the entertainment specialty groupctive. He serves as Director of Spyglass Entertainment Group, LLC. Gary Barber has been Board Observer of JBF Interlude 2009 Ltd since December 2015. He serves as a Director at MGM Holdings Inc. He serves as an Executive Committee Member of the Los Angeles Police Department's Crime Prevention Advisory Board (DARE Program) and a Member of the board of directors at the Foundation of Motion Picture Pioneers. He joined Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Inc. He orchestrated the formation of United Artists Media Group. Gary arber is a Member of the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Science and a Member of the Board of the C.L.E.A.R. Foundation. Gary Barber received his undergraduate and post graduate degrees from the University of Witwatersrand in South Africa. He practiced as a Chartered Accountant and Certified Public Accountant in both South Africa and the USA with Price Waterhouse. .Read More
